message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, as it is worth $10,000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer represents a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality product at a discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.
